item.title: Reliably Unforking a GitHub Repository Without Deletion and Reconstruction
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article describes how to separate a forked repository from its parent repository using GitHub Support, avoiding data loss from deletion and reconstruction, and helping developers better manage forked repositories.
